mapper.sql: USER_KY, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, TELEPHONE, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select:
SELECT USER_KY, USER_NAME, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL FROM [tbeh_dc_user] WHERE 1=1
AND USER_NAME like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone}
ORDER BY USER_KY DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into tbeh_dc_user
USER_KY,
USER_CODE,
USER_NAME,
PASSWORD,
TELEPHONE,
MOBILE_PHONE,
EMAIL,
INSERT_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update tbeh_dc_user
USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where USER_KY = #{userKy,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbeh_dc_user set USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where USER_KY = #{userKy,jdbcType=INTEGER}
